longDesc:
GIVEN two glossaries with a term Alpha
AND two documents Document 1 and Document 2, both mentioning term Alpha
AND a configuration linking.headingIdAlgorithm: "sha256-7"
THEN in the glossary files both terms MUST have a different hash value AND in document files links MUST use a SHA256 URL fragment as a link target identifier AND in the generated index file there MUST be one entry for the term AND there MUST be two glossaries linked under that entry AND there MUST be two documents linked under that entry
shortDesc:
